scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run gzip && npm run sync
scripts.sync: npm run sync-css && npm run sync-js && npm run sync-json && npm run sync-html && npm run sync-unzipped
scripts.sync-css: aws s3 sync _site/ s3://douglasduhaime.com/ --exclude '*' --include '*.css'  --content-type text/css --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=2592000 --content-encoding gzip
scripts.sync-js: aws s3 sync _site/ s3://douglasduhaime.com/ --exclude '*' --include '*.js'   --content-type text/javascript --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=2592000 --content-encoding gzip
scripts.sync-json: aws s3 sync _site/ s3://douglasduhaime.com/ --exclude '*' --include '*.json' --content-type application/json --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=2592000 --content-encoding gzip
scripts.sync-html: aws s3 sync _site/ s3://douglasduhaime.com/ --exclude '*' --include '*.html' --content-type 'text/html; charset=UTF-8' --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=2592000 --content-encoding gzip
scripts.sync-svg: aws s3 sync _site/ s3://douglasduhaime.com/ --exclude '*' --include '*.svg'  --content-type 'image/svg+xml' --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=2592000 --content-encoding gzip
scripts.sync-unzipped: aws s3 sync _site/ s3://douglasduhaime.com/ --include '*' --exclude '*.css' --exclude '*.js' --exclude '*.json' --exclude '*.html' --exclude '*.svg' --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=2592000
